mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_EVALUATE" (ID, SHOP_ID, CRAWLER_DATE, EVA_VALUE, QUALITY, GOODS,MERCHANTID,RATING_AT,REPLIED) VALUES (#{id},#{shopId},#{crawlerDate},#{evaValue},#{quality},#{goods},#{merchantId},#{ratingAt},#{replied})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_ACTIVITY" (PRI,CRAWLER_DATE,ID, SHOP_ID, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, NAME, STATUS, CONTENT, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, IS_SHARE,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{pri},#{crawlerDate},#{id},#{shopId},#{beginDate},#{endDate},#{name},#{status},#{content},#{createTime},#{description},#{isShare},#{merchantId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_BILL" (PRI,CLOSUBG_DATE, INCOME, EXPENSE, DEDUCT_AMOUNT, DUE_AMOUNT, PAY_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_DATE, SHOP_ID,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{pri},#{closingDate},#{income},#{expense},#{deductAmount},#{dueAmount},#{payAmount},#{paymentDate},#{shopId},#{merchantId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_COMMODITY" (PRI,MESSAGE_DATE, SHOP_ID, FOOD_NAME, SALES_AMOUNT, SALES_AMOUNT_RATE, SALES_VOLUME, SALES_VOLUME_RATE,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{pri},#{messageDate},#{shopId},#{foodName},#{salesAmount},#{salesAmountRate},#{salesVolume},#{salesVolumeRate},#{merchantId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_FLOW" (FLOW_ID, CRAWLER_DATE, SHOP_NAME, EXPOSURE_TOTAL_COUNT, VISITOR_NUM, BUYER_NUM,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{flowId},#{crawlerDate},#{shopName},#{exposureTotalCount},#{visitorNum},#{buyerNum},#{merchantId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_SALE" (SALE_ID, ORDER_DATE, SHOP, TOTAL_ORDER_AMOUNT, FOOD_AMOUNT, BOX_AMOUNT, DELIVER_AMOUNT, ONLINE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, OFFLINE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, RESTAURANT_DISCOUNT, ELEME_DISCOUNT, VALID_ORDER_COUNT, AVERAGE_PRICE, INVALID_ORDER_COUNT, LOSS_SALE_AMOUNT,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{saleId},#{orderDate},#{shop},#{totalOrderAmount},#{foodAmount},#{boxAmount},#{deliverAmount},#{onlinePaymentAmount},#{offlinePaymentAmount},#{restaurantDiscount},#{elemeDiscount},#{validOrderCount},#{averagePrice},#{invalidOrderCount},#{lossSaleAmount},#{merchantId})

INSERT INTO "HYF"."BIL_ELEME_ORDER" (ORDER_ID, SHOP_ID, ADDRESS, CREATE_AT, ACTIVE_AT, DELIVER_FEE, DELIVER_TIME, DESCRIPTION, GROUPS, INVOICE, BOOK, ONLINE_PAID, PHONE_LIST, OPEN_ID, SHOP_NAME, DAY_SN, STATUS, REFUND_STATUS, USER_ID, TOTAL_PRICE, ORIGINAL_PRICE, CONSIGNEE, DELIVERY_GEO, DELIVERY_POI_ADDRESS, INVOICED, INCOME, SERVICE_RATE, SERVICE_FEE, HONGBAO, PACKAGE_FEE, ACTIVITY_TOTAL, SHOP_PART, ELEME_PART, DOWNGRADED, SECRET_PHONE_EXPIRE_TIME, ORDER_ACTIVITIES, INVOICE_TYPE, TAXPAYER_ID,MERCHANTID) VALUES (#{orderId},#{shopId},#{address},#{createdAt},#{activeAt},#{deliverFee},#{deliverTime},#{description},#{groups},#{invoice},#{book},#{onlinePaid},#{phoneList},#{openId},#{shopName},#{daySn},#{status},#{refundStatus},#{userId},#{totalPrice},#{originalPrice},#{consignee},#{deliveryGeo},#{deliveryPoiAddress},#{invoiced},#{income},#{serviceRate},#{serviceFee},#{hongbao},#{packageFee},#{activityTotal},#{shopPart},#{elemePart},#{downgraded},#{secretPhoneExpireTime},#{orderActivities},#{invoiceType},#{taxpayerId},#{merchantId})
